item.title: This trader says AI IPOs and a falling dollar could drive the S&P 500 to 8,200 next year
item.description: Samantha LaDuc has nailed some big calls on stocks in recent years. She sees another S&P 500 high coming in 2026, but an unhappy Main Street.

item.title: These stocks doubled the S&P 500’s return in 2025 — why a 2026 repeat looks likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: What will it take for Amazon’s stock to finally take off?
item.description: Amazon’s stock trailed its ‘Magnificent Seven’ counterparts in 2025. Growth in the company’s cloud-computing, advertising and retail segments could sp...

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
item.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”
